channel.title: About on Datactivist
channel.description: Recent content in About on Datactivist

item.title: Our Mission
item.description: The research in social science of Datactivist's founders entertained a belief that it is essential to put users at the centre of open data policies. In his doctoral dissertation, Samuel GoÃ«ta showed that the datasets published on open data portals often come out of the logic of the offer: the administrations employees choose the datasets to be open and how they will be published without taking into account the users needs about data.

item.title: Our values
item.description: Our Values Our name is the witness of the values that lead us:

item.title: Our team
item.description: All members of the team we gathered are marked, in their path, by having developped a strong personal link with data, that they wish to serve general good and everyone's interest. Data will be an empowerment tool or won't be.
